manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Luoba Multi-functional Smart Watch, Meet for Your Use! Why Choose Luoba smart watch ? If you're looking for a cost-effective, stylish, and creative multiple smartwatch and fitness tracker, don't miss us, we have everything you need for everyday use. Luoba 1.69 " full touch screen smartwatch for men women, the screen is HD and sensitive. Custom dials for a more personalized watch. The big color screen and the soft and comfortable wear give you the best visual experience and use of the watch. The ideal Christmas / Birthday / Holiday / Valentine's Day gift for women men mom dad, lovers, family, and friends! Luoba smart watch, your personal assistant and health butler, with smart reminders so you don't miss important calls and messages. Real-time monitoring tracks your sleep, health data, etc when you are active, steps, calories, distance when you exercise, etc. Data recording and analysis allow you to focus on health management for a healthier body and a better life. There are also music control, camera control, weather information, alarm clock, stopwatch, and other useful functions to give you more surprises！ Warm Tips. 1. When using the watch for the first time, please charge it first to activate it. This watch usually needs to be charged once every 2-3 days. But everyone's usage is different and you will have to charge your watch according to your actual usage. If you are using features that use more power, such as raising your hand to light up the screen, continuously answering and making calls, receiving messages, playing music, etc., chances are you will need to recharge once a day. 2. The watch has message notifications, but the new messages will automatically overwrite the old ones, only the first 8 latest messages can be kept, and some APP messages cannot be displayed for reading, only notifications are displayed. If the watch is disconnected from the phone, the watch will not receive any messages or notifications of incoming calls. The watch can only receive messages, it cannot send or reply to any messages. 3. The data provided by the watch is for reference only and cannot be used as a professional instrument data. 4.If the charger can not be charged, please check whether the adapter voltage is 5V2A output, and whether there is a metal foreign body at the magnetic charging end.

Fitness Tracker Smartwatches, More Care for You! After a successful connection, the phone will sync the watch activity tracking sleep data and other health data, view detailed data analysis through the Dafit APP, keep yourself informed and aware of your health, and develop a healthier lifestyle and exercise. Warm Tips: The sleep and health monitoring data of this smartwatch are for reference only and cannot be used as professional instrument data. Specification： Battery capacity: 250mAh App for the Watch: Dafit APP Compatible System: iOS 10.0 & Android 5.0 above Total length: 10.09 inches, strap width, 0.78 inch Bluetooth Connection Distance: 26-32 feet maximum linear distance Charging Type: magnetic wire charging, USB charging port Working time: about 2 hours full charge, 2-3 days normal use, 5-7 days standby time.

Dial Call & Message Notification Once successfully connected, you won't miss calls or messages from your phone, the watch will vibrate to alert you, and you can even call back on the watch. Sedentary Reminder With this function switched on, it will become your personal health assistant and vibrates to remind you when you are working long hours and are not active. Physiological Cycle Reminder Keep track of your personal cycle and set reminders through the DaFit APP to give yourself more care, and pay attention to your health.

Remote Camera Control After a successful connection, with a gentle shake of the watch, your phone can quickly capture your beautiful moments with your family. Music Control A smart gadget to control music and switch songs easily through your watch, no need to operate on your phone, enjoy your music time easily. Weather Information Keep track of your personal cycle and set reminders through the DaFit APP to give yourself more care, and pay attention to your health.

Multi-sports Fitness Watches for Men Women Luoba Fitness Smartwatch supports 7 sports modes, Walking, Running, Cycling, Skipping, Badminton, Basketball, Football, etc. After exercise, you can view the calories, distance, and steps tracked and recorded by the watch on the Dafit App and use the data to plan your workout and keep fit. Warm Tips: Luoba android smart watch is not designed to be used while swimming, diving, or in a sauna, but it is not necessary to take it off when washing your hands. For a better experience, please remove the watch after exercise and dry your wrist and watch. Packing Includes： 1 x Smartwatch 1 x Charger 1 x User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great watch for the price
reviews.reviewText: Smart watches are often hit or miss in this price range, but this one is pretty good for what you get. I will admit that the battery life could be better, but I have a smartwatch from a top brand with battery life issues as well and spent way more on that one. So the 5 stars is because this price range usually means the watch will suffer in some areas and if you are the type to not sleep with your watch on you can just let it charge at night, if you like to sleep with your watch on like I do because the vibration on my arm works as a great alarm, charging it in the morning while you shower/get ready for your day is another option that can allow you to get the battery life you need in those moments you don't need to use your watch and it should last throughout the day after doing this. You need to give this a recharge once a day or every other day depending on usage.Watches in this price range often don't have a speaker or have poor speaker quality, this watch however has a really great speaker and sound is very clear. Screen size is great and screen is very clear and responsive. I was skeptical about the watch at first but I like it better than the one I spent over $400 for. The band is easily replaceable if you like to switch up the style on your arm. I'd say it's a good, budget friendly option for those, like me, who would rather have something that functions, looks good, and is reliable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great watch doe the price!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this watch 10 months ago and it has withheld my expectations. Easy to operate and decent battery life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice watch, but ...
reviews.reviewText: It's a nice watch. Keeps time well and looks nice. Easy to connect to my phone.I got it for the BP, SP02 and heart rate monitors. The blood pressure tracker is NOT accurate. It keeps telling me that my BP is 140/85. My BP is nowhere near that high. The SP02 is off a few points but I can live with the difference. Same with the heart rate.The step counter is pretty accurate.I don't use it to make or get phone calls so I just turn the phone app off.You can only set 3 alarms.The sound is not very good nor is the vibration. I set one alarm with the vibration on for a test, and couldn't feel it when the alarm went off.I like it enough to keep it, but would not buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good entry-level smartwatch
reviews.reviewText: This is a good entry-level smartwatch. It's the first one that I've had, but it seems to work well. It has a number of features such as step tracking, heart rate and blood pressure tracking. I can't verify exactly how precise the heart rate and blood pressure tracking are, but the blood pressure measurement seems pretty similar to what I've gotten at the doctor's and the pharmacy's machine, so it seems to work reasonably well.The battery life seems pretty good. I've been charging it about once every 4 days or so and it hasn't run out of battery at any point with that charging schedule, so it lasts for a while.It also has a number of features that I don't use much, such as breathing reminders, sleep trackers, a music player, a camera shutter button to control your phone camera, and a workout tracker.All the features sync through the app so you can see additional detailed information on your phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was An amazing dupe for a smart watch. I wear it daily for work purposes and it helps me keep up with all the things connected through my phone and my exercise/steps for the day!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Decent for the price, but not intuitive to setup
reviews.reviewText: Works ok as a device to notify you of messages and all from your phone.Step count is probably better than Fitbit for truck drivers, although still kind of high. I would get 10k steps in a day on my Fitbit by only driving my truck. And sometimes over 100 flights of stairs of I had lots of hills. With this device I'm averaging about half the number of steps.The most confusing part was Bluetooth pairing. I was getting stats for steps, hear taste, blood pressure, etc. However, no phone management, voice assistant or messages. The app connected fine. Not sure why this needs 2 types of connections... Anyway, after I sent an email to support, I turned the watch off. When I turned it on again, I got a notification that it wanted to pair to my phone. So I accepted and now that all works.Still haven't heard from support after 3 days.Another issue is that sleep tracking on the app starts at midnight. It doesn't count the hours if I go to sleep at 10pm, nor does it count those hours as part of the previous day. If I get up at 4:30am, it looks like I only got 3.5 hours of sleep for the day.The other gripe is that the date display on the watch is day/month. I see no way to change it to month/day as in the US I'm used to that format.I've lowered my rating. Still having major issues with Bluetooth pairing. Sometimes it's connected, most of the time it's not so I don't get notifications. No response from support.

Diese Smartwatch mag zwar relativ günstig sein im Vergleich zu einigen Mitbewerber-Modellen, steht diesen aber definitiv in nichts nach. Es gibt zahlreiche Funktionen wie u.a. Anrufe und Nachrichten annehmen, Sporttracking, Puls- und Herzfrequenzzähler, Schrittzähler und Angabe des Kalorienverbrauchs, Weckfunktion, Taschenlampe und und und. Die App dazu ist übersichtlich gestaltet und gibt die Möglichkeit von zahlreichen (teils animierten) Displayhintergründen zu wählen, um die Uhr auf seine persönlichen Anforderungen anzupassen. Der Akku hält eine komplette Arbeitswoche, was ebenfalls ein großer Vorteil ist. Definitiv eine Kaufempfehlung!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: Attractive and easy to use smart watch!
reviews.reviewText: Smart Watch, luoba 1.69'' Full Touch Answer/Make Call Women Smartwatch for Android Phones Fitness Tracker with Heart Rate Sleep Monitor Calorie Step Counter Sports Fitness Watch for Android iOS, Pink.This arrived well presented in its on box that's also covered in cellophane.Would make a perfect gift but this one is a gift to one's self!This smart watch has a pink adjustable strap and the watch itself has a gold frame, very beautiful and I'm so happy with it, I choose well after searching for a suitable watch for many hours!This works perfectly with no issues, the battery life is very good as I've only had to charge it just the once since it arrived.It's exactly as the description describes and I can reccomend.Great quality and easy to use!

Die Uhr liegt angenehm am Handgelenk.Man kann Anrufe annehmen und sie mit WhatsApp verbinden.Schrittzähler, Blutdruck und Herzfrequenz werfen gemessen.Man kann aus verschiedenen Hintergründen wählen.Einziges Manko: es gibt keine deutsche Gebrauchsanweisung, aber mit der App klappt es ganz gut

Wir suchten eine Smartwatch aber wollten keine 200-300 Euro dafür ausgeben. Hauptgrund war eine Anzeige der Nachrichten wie zum Beispiel WhatsApp ohne immer das Handy aus der Tasche holen zu müssen.Wir hatten schon eine andere Uhr probiert aber da ging das nicht sehr zuverlässig.Mit dieser jetzt funktioniert es sehr gut.Auch die Anbindung über die App mit dem Handy hat auf Anhieb geklappt. Das Material ist angenehm zu tragen. Ein nettes Detail ist der Stift, mit dem man das Armband wechseln kann ist toll gemacht so geht ein Wechsel leicht und ohne Werkzeug.Dazu gibt es einige Sportfunktionen wie Schrittzähler so das man man sie im Rahmen auch für den Sport benutzen kann.In Summe würden wir diese im Vergleich günstige Uhr wieder kaufen, sie macht was sie soll und bisher sehr zuverlässig.
